Reviews.Title: “Our first visit to Berlin”
Reviews.Author: itsthewayitellem
Reviews.Content: situated quiet leafy district shopping easy access tourist attractions hotel welcoming friendly owner staff trouble warm comfortable beds breakfast smoked salmon cheese ham etc coffee lots

Reviews.Title: “A clean friendly hotel with wonderful breakfasts and a good location”
Reviews.Author: davidf963
Reviews.Content: party five stayed nights november hotel located ten minutes stroll nearby restaurants hotel staff able recommend ideal own hotel friendly care attention breakfast included package continental breakfast spotless hotel furnished attractive art decor style purchased berlin welcome cards hotel allowed walk pick local bus zoo terminus able 100 200 local buses include virtually tourist sights route return berlin definitely stay hotel alexander
